subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ss General Manager Brian Cashman hunts for deals before the July 31 trading deadline, Joe Torre, the manager, would prefer an outfielder over a pitcher if he had to make a choice.
snippet: Ss General Manager Brian Cashman hunts for deals before the July 31 trading deadline, Joe Torre, the manager, would prefer an outfielder over a pitcher if he had to make a choice.
